de.take_weiland.mods.commons.util

Class InventoryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.take_weiland.mods.commons.util.InventoryUtils

  • public final class InventoryUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static utility methods regarding implementors of IInventory
    Author:
    diesieben07

      • decreaseStackSize

        public static final net.minecraft.item.ItemStack decreaseStackSize(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory inventory,
                                             int slot,
                                             int count)
        generic implementation for IInventory.decrStackSize(int, int)
        Parameters:
        inventory - the inventory
        slot - the slot to be decreased in size
        count - the number of items to be depleted
        Returns:
        the stack being depleted from the inventory

      • getAndRemove

                                        int slot)
        generic implementation for IInventory.getStackInSlotOnClosing(int)
        gets the contents from the given slot and then empties it
        Parameters:
        inventory - the inventory
        slot - the slot to get the contents from
        Returns:
        the slots contents

      • spillIfInventory

        public static final <T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity & net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory> void spillIfInventory(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity tileEntity)
        calls spill(T) only if the given TileEntity implements IInventory
        Parameters:
        tileEntity - the TileEntity

      • spill

        public static final <T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity & net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory> void spill(T tileEntity)
        spill the contents of a TileEntity that also implements IInventory into the world.
        Usually used in Block.breakBlock(net.minecraft.world.World, int, int, int, int, int)
        Parameters:
        tileEntity - the TileEntity

      • writeInventory

        public static final net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList writeInventory(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory inventory)
        Serialize an IInventory to a NBTTagList
        The contents may be read back with readInventory(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory, net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList)
        Parameters:
        inventory - the inventory to write
        Returns:
        the NBTTagList containing the serialized contents of the inventory

      • readInventory

        public static final void readInventory(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory inventory,
                 net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList nbtList)
        Unserialize an IInventory from a NBTTagList
        The format of the NBT should match that produced by writeInventory(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory)
        Parameters:
        inventory - the inventory to be unserialized
        nbtList - the NBTTagList containing the serialized contents

        public static final java.lang.Iterable<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> iterate(net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory inventory)
        Generate an Iterable for the given IInventory
        Parameters:
        inventory - the Inventory
        Returns:
        an Iterable that returns the stacks in the inventory in order
